description: Try our easy to follow Satay Beef with Broccoli Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried rice,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Rice,Egg free,Beef,Dairy free,Father's Day
name: Satay Beef with Broccoli Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 head broccoli, stems peeled, chopped, cut into small florets
1 bunch baby bok choy, stems and leaves shredded separately
0.5 cup sheets frozen puff pastry, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Slice steak into 1cm strips across the grain. Marinate in 1 tbs each of the oil and kecap manis. Thread beef onto 12 soaked bamboo skewers.

Combine remaining kecap manis with peanut butter and chilli flakes in a small saucepan. Whisk in 1/3 cup boiling water and stir over low heat until liquid simmers. Remove from heat and stir in lime or lemon juice.

To make broccoli fried rice, heat remaining oil in a wok or pan over high heat. Add broccoli, rice and ginger and stirfry for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add bok choy stems and stir-fry for a further 2 minutes. Toss through bok choy leaves until just wilted.
Heat a chargrill pan or barbecue grill on high. Cook beef skewers for 34 minutes, turning once, or until well browned and sticky.
Serve skewers atop broccoli fried rice and spoon over satay sauce.
